name: ä½ ä¸èƒ½
author: å¼ æ€å®‰
lyric:
You don't know who you are,
And you can't have what you want,
You don't know what's your name,
You've always been blind.
No-one will tell you what to do,
You have to find a way out alone.
 
Don't be scared,
I'll be here if you want.
Don't think too much
If you don't want to cross the boundaries of madness.
 
And you fell again
Finding a way out
but there isn't really a way out
you're stuck, stuck
In a place you don't understand.
You can't escape and you can't open your eyes
There's no way out
And no-one really cares if you are dead or alive.

name: æˆ‘ä»€ä¹ˆéƒ½æ²¡è¯´
author: å¼ æ€å®‰
lyric:
And I, I said nothing.
I said nothing when you.
(when you took my everything)
When you told me to trust you i said nothing
(when you stole my name I said nothing)
And when you threatened to kill me I said nothing
(When you took that knife and you put it inside, and you put it in front of my eyes I said nothing)
And when you told me to do what you wanted I said nothing (When you stole my life and made me do things I didn't want to do I said nothing yes I said nothing)
And when you took away my soul I said nothing. (you took everything, you took my toys, you took my love...)
And when you left me with nothing I said nothing
And when you left I said nothing
(you took my time)
And when you took everything away from (everything I believed in I said nothing...) me I said nothing
I said nothing, I said nothing....

name: åä¸‰
author: å¼ æ€å®‰
lyric:
Bombs in Paris and bombs in the sky
Is this really happening ?
We say we know but we don't know
If it is the beginning or if it is the end
No !
 
Bombs in Paris and bombs in the sky
A see of blood and a sea of tears
It takes a man to change one's mind
It takes humanity to change the world
No !
 
What can we do about the absurdity
That always brings the worse in us
Are we ready to share our lives
With the ones we pretend to respect ?
 
The end is near the end is far
The truth is real the truth is a lie
Oh brother can you hear me cry ?
Their are bombs in your ears but everybody is deaf
Brainwashed souls have made their body explode
Are we too stupid to evolve ?
Will there be a brighter tomorrow ?
Education, is it just another fake hope ?
Will there be a brighter tomorrow ?

name: çŸ³çªŸ
author: å¼ æ€å®‰
lyric:
He had been walking for so long he couldn't remember his name.
The heat had made his feelings numb and he had forgotten why he had been walking.
 
All the lies he had been fed as a kid were now coming back to his mind.
The devil would only leave him alone if he decided to change.
Too many options, too many doors to open and only one key,
and he thought, If only I had been to church more, maybe i could have saved my soul...
 
A blind soul in the middle of nowhere.
Deaf and mute he could only speak in tongues.
He knew he could never leave...
His ability to become someone new had been blocked by his blind ears.
Everywhere he went, he couldn't forget he'd never find the right door for that key and would be a prisoner of his own inability to see again, and to accept to see the truth.
 
He could feel the sun on his skin,
So he put his face toward the light,
and opened his eyelids.
 
Nothing, he still couldn't see.
So he got back into the cavern.
And told his brother:
"There it's nothing out there
But it is for tout to see by yourself
We don't become anything, all of us
We just are, and that's enough."
